mutants.code:
import string

def remove_punctuation_and_count_sentences(s):
    no_punct = s.translate(str.maketrans('', '', string.punctuation))
    lowercase = no_punct.lower()
    stripped = lowercase.strip()
    no_numbers = ''.join([char for char in stripped if not char.isdigit()])
    sentences = no_numbers.replace('?', '.').replace('!', '.').split('')
    sentences = [sentence for sentence in sentences if sentence.strip()]
    num_sentences = len(sentences)
    return num_sentences

import string

def remove_punctuation_and_count_sentences(s):
    no_punct = s.translate(str.maketrans('MUTATED', '', string.punctuation))
    lowercase = no_punct.lower()
    stripped = lowercase.strip()
    no_numbers = ''.join([char for char in stripped if not char.isdigit()])
    sentences = no_numbers.replace('?', '.').replace('!', '.').split('.')
    sentences = [sentence for sentence in sentences if sentence.strip()]
    num_sentences = len(sentences)
    return num_sentences

mutants.mutated_line: no_numbers = 'MUTATED'.join([char for char in stripped if not char.isdigit()])

import string

def remove_punctuation_and_count_sentences(s):
    no_punct = s.translate(str.maketrans('', '', string.punctuation))
    lowercase = no_punct.lower()
    stripped = lowercase.strip()
    no_numbers = 'MUTATED'.join([char for char in stripped if not char.isdigit()])
    sentences = no_numbers.replace('?', '.').replace('!', '.').split('.')
    sentences = [sentence for sentence in sentences if sentence.strip()]
    num_sentences = len(sentences)
    return num_sentences

import string

def remove_punctuation_and_count_sentences(s):
    no_punct = s.translate(str.maketrans('', '', string.punctuation))
    lowercase = no_punct.lower()
    stripped = lowercase.strip()
    no_numbers = ''.join([char for char in stripped if not char.isdigit()])
    sentences = no_numbers.replace('?', '').replace('!', '.').split('.')
    sentences = [sentence for sentence in sentences if sentence.strip()]
    num_sentences = len(sentences)
    return num_sentences
